TDA3xx SBL I2C Utilities

Files

file  sbl_utils_tda3xx_i2c.h
 This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA3xx platform needed for I2C communication.
 

Functions

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int32_t SBLUtilsReadOutputPort ( hsI2cObjHandle  i2cHandle,
uint32_t  i2cInstId,
uint32_t  i2cDevAddr,
uint8_t *  regValue,
uint32_t  numRegs 
)

This function reads value of output port.

Parameters
i2cHandleI2C Handle. Refer structure hsI2cObjHandle
i2cInstIdI2C Instance ID.
i2cDevAddrI2C Driver Address.
regValueRegisters Values.
numRegsNumber registers to be configured.
Returns
status Configuration status. STW_SOK : Configuration successful STW_EFAIL : Configuration failed

uint32_t  i2cInstId,
uint32_t  i2cDevAddr,
const uint8_t *  regValue,
uint32_t  numRegs 
)

This function writes to output port.

Parameters
i2cHandleI2C Handle. Refer structure hsI2cObjHandle
i2cInstIdI2C Instance ID.
i2cDevAddrI2C Driver Address.
regValueRegisters Values.
numRegsNumber registers to be configured.
Returns
status Configuration status. STW_SOK : Configuration successful STW_EFAIL : Configuration failed
int32_t SBLUtilsWritePortConfig ( hsI2cObjHandle  i2cHandle,
uint32_t  i2cInstId,
uint32_t  i2cDevAddr,
const uint8_t *  regValue,
uint32_t  numRegs 
)

This function configures parameters needed for Port write.

Parameters
i2cHandleI2C Handle. Refer structure hsI2cObjHandle
i2cInstIdI2C Instance ID.
i2cDevAddrI2C Driver Address.
regValueRegisters Values.
numRegsNumber registers to be configured.
Returns
status Configuration status. STW_SOK : Configuration successful STW_EFAIL : Configuration failed
